name: Exist Global
description:
Exist is a global technology innovator providing enterprise solutions through consulting and innovative products and services.
With a comprehensive portfolio of integrated Information Technology solutions and services, we empower enterprises to transform and build sustainable advantage.
We are one of the early adopters of Java Open Source Software, which has become the core technology when building scalable, robust and highly customizable software application.
Existâ€™s technology solutions and services span clients in Asia Pacific, Australia and the US from a diverse range of verticals including Retail, Banking and Finance, Healthcare, and other industries.
Founded in 2001, Exist has grown to over a hundred workforce and continues to grow, with offices in the US and Philippines.
